name: mannyTheSkeleton - Swordplay
description:
mannyTheSkeleton - Swordplay (0.5b) A draft 3D HTML sword fight game.

How to play:

On the right panel there are the action buttons (icons) which you use to attack.
Keep in mind that each actions is stored in queue and start when last action  has finished.
On top of screen there are the health bars each player.
You are "player1" (on the right). 
You can queue actions at any time (even the battle has not start yet, or battle is in pause). 
Use mouse left button (MLB) to rotate , and mouse right button (MRB) to move camera. Use wheel to zoom.
The battle finish when one health bar become red ( 0% health). Don't worry!
Start next battle at once.

Enjoy!
